song.englishname: Something About The Name Jesus Pt. 2

english.segment1: [chorus:] Its something about the name Jesus. Something about the name Jesus. Something about the name jesus. It is the sweetest name I know. Oh how I love the name Jesus, Oh how I love the name Jesus. It is the sweetest name I know.
english.segment2: Some people say I'm crazy but,(God ew ooh) I can't explain the power that I feel when I call your name ( when I call your name) said it's just like fire shut-up in my bones. The holy ghost is moving (yes it is) and just won't leave me alone. There's something yeah yeah yeah
english.segment4: Said it's sweeter than honey(locked in) from the honeycomb. (I feel em) I can fell the holy ghost moving and it won't leave won't leave me alone (no, no, no, no, no, nooo) at the name of Jesus (ooohhh) every knee has got to bow (got to bow) so you don't have to wait till the fire comes you can call on him shout praise him do it right now.
english.segment5: . [chorus:] Something about the name Jesus, something about the name Jesus. It is the sweetest name I know Oh how I love the name Jesus , Oh how I love the name Jesus. It is the sweetest name I know, I know, I know, I knoooowwwwww
english.segment7: It is the sweetest name I knooooowwwwwww. [repeat 5 times ]
english.segment9: Oh I love the name Jesus (Jesus). oh (oh). oh (oh). Jesus
